  1: <?php
  2: /**
  3:  * Ce fichier est développé pour la gestion de la librairie Mélanie2
  4:  * Cette Librairie permet d'accèder aux données sans avoir à implémenter de couche SQL
  5:  * Des objets génériques vont permettre d'accèder et de mettre à jour les données
  6:  *
  7:  * ORM M2 Copyright © 2017  PNE Annuaire et Messagerie/MEDDE
  8:  *
  9:  * This program is free software: you can redistribute it and/or modify
 10:  * it under the terms of the GNU General Public License as published by
 11:  * the Free Software Foundation, either version 3 of the License, or
 12:  * (at your option) any later version.
 13:  *
 14:  * This program is distributed in the hope that it will be useful,
 15:  * but WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of
 16:  * MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE.  See the
 17:  * GNU General Public License for more details.
 18:  *
 19:  * You should have received a copy of the GNU General Public License
 20:  * along with this program.  If not, see <http://www.gnu.org/licenses/>.
 21:  */
 22: namespace LibMelanie\Lib;
 23: 
 24: use LibMelanie\Config\ConfigMelanie;
 25: use LibMelanie\Api\Melanie2\Attachment;
 26: use LibMelanie\Api\Melanie2\Recurrence;
 27: use LibMelanie\Api\Melanie2\User;
 28: use LibMelanie\Api\Melanie2\Event;
 29: use LibMelanie\Api\Melanie2\Attendee;
 30: use LibMelanie\Api\Melanie2\Calendar;
 31: use LibMelanie\Log\M2Log;
 32: 
 33: // Utilisation de la librairie Sabre VObject pour la conversion ICS
 34: @include_once 'vendor/autoload.php';
 35: use Sabre\VObject;
 36: 
 37: /**
 38:  * Class de génération de l'ICS en fonction de l'objet évènement
 39:  * Méthodes Statiques
 40:  *
 41:  * @author PNE Messagerie/Apitech
 42:  * @package Librairie Mélanie2
 43:  * @subpackage Lib Mélanie2
 44:  *
 45:  */
 46: class EventToICS {
 47:     /**
 48:      * Identifiant de l'outil utilisant l'ICS (pour la génération)
 49:      * @var string
 50:      */
 51:     const PRODID = '-//ORM LibMelanie2 PHP/PNE Messagerie/MEDDE';
 52:     /**
 53:      * Version ICalendar utilisé pour la génération de l'ICS
 54:      * @var string
 55:      */
 56:     const VERSION = '2.0';
 57: 
 58:     /**
 59:      * Variable configurable depuis l'extérieur pour définir
 60:      * si les pièces jointes sont proposées via une URL
 61:      * ou directement en binaire (encodage base64)
 62:      * @var bool
 63:      */
 64:     public static $USE_ATTACH_URL = true;
 65: 
 66: 
 67:     /**
 68:      *  Constructeur privé pour ne pas instancier la classe
 69:      */
 70:     private function __construct() { }
 71: 
 72:     /**
 73:      * Génére un ICS en fonction de l'évènement passé en paramètre
 74:      * L'évènement doit être de type Event de la librairie LibM2
 75:      * Gère également les exceptions, peut donc retourner plusieurs composant VEVENT
 76:      * @param Event $event
 77:      * @param Calendar $calendar
 78:      * @param User $user
 79:      * @param VObject\Component\VCalendar $vcalendar
 80:      * @param boolean $useattachments Si l'ics doit inclure les pièces jointes
 81:      * @param boolean $isfreebusy Si on ne retourne que les freebusy (pas de pièce jointe ou de participants)
 82:      * @return string $ics
 83:      */
 84:     public static function Convert(Event $event, Calendar $calendar = null, User $user = null, VObject\Component\VCalendar $vcalendar = null, $useattachments = true, $isfreebusy = false) {
 85:     if (!isset($vcalendar)) {
 86:       $vcalendar = self::getVCalendar($event, $calendar, $user, $useattachments, $isfreebusy);
 87:     }
 88:         return $vcalendar->serialize();
 89:     }
 90: 
 91:     /**
 92:      * Génére un VObject\Component\VCalendar en fonction de l'évènement passé en paramètre
 93:      * L'évènement doit être de type Event de la librairie LibM2
 94:      * Gère également les exceptions, peut donc retourner plusieurs composant VEVENT
 95:      * @param Event $event
 96:      * @param Calendar $calendar
 97:      * @param User $user
 98:      * @param boolean $useattachments Si l'ics doit inclure les pièces jointes
 99:      * @param boolean $isfreebusy Si on ne retourne que les freebusy (pas de pièce jointe ou de participants)
100:      * @return VObject\Component\VCalendar $vcalendar
101:      */
102:     public static function getVCalendar(Event $event, Calendar $calendar = null, User $user = null, $useattachments = true, $isfreebusy = false, $vcalendar = null) {
103:       M2Log::Log(M2Log::LEVEL_DEBUG, "EventToICS->getVCalendar()");
104:       if (!isset($vcalendar)) {
105:         $vcalendar = new VObject\Component\VCalendar();
106:       }
107:       $vevent = $vcalendar->add('VEVENT');
108:       // PRODID et Version
109:       $vcalendar->PRODID = self::PRODID;
110:       $vcalendar->VERSION = self::VERSION;
111:       // Configuration pour l'utilisation des URLs pour les pièces jointes
112:       // Se fait en fonction des informations fournies par le client
113:       self::$USE_ATTACH_URL = !isset($_SERVER["HTTP_X_MOZ_ATTACHMENTS"]) || $_SERVER["HTTP_X_MOZ_ATTACHMENTS"] != 1;
114:       // UID
115:       $vevent->UID = $event->uid;
116:       if (!$event->deleted) {
117:         $vevent = self::getVeventFromEvent($vevent, $event, $calendar, $user, $useattachments, $isfreebusy);
118:         // Type récurrence
119:         if (isset($event->recurrence->type)
120:             && $event->recurrence->type !== Recurrence::RECURTYPE_NORECUR) {
121:           $timeStart = new \DateTime($event->start);
122:           $rrule = $event->recurrence->rrule;
123:           $params = [];
124:           foreach ($rrule as $key => $value) {
125:             if (!is_string($value)) {
126:               if ($value instanceof \DateTime) {
127:                 $value = $value->format('Ymd').'T'.$value->format('His').'Z';
128:               }
129:             }
130:             if ($key == ICS::INTERVAL && $value == 1) {
131:               // On n'affiche pas l'interval 1 dans l'ICS
132:               continue;
133:             }
134:             else if (is_array($value)) {
135:               $value = implode(',', $value);
136:             }
137:             $params[] = "$key=$value";
138:           }
139:           // Construction de la récurrence
140:           $vevent->add(ICS::RRULE, implode(';',$params));
141:         }
142:       }
143:       // Exceptions
144:       if (count($event->exceptions > 0)) {
145:         $exdate = [];
146:         $first = true;
147:         $starttime = '';
148:         foreach ($event->exceptions as $exception) {
149:           $exRecId = $exception->getAttribute(ICS::RECURRENCE_ID);
150:           if (!isset($exRecId)) {
151:             if ($event->deleted) {
152:               $exRecId = date('Y-m-d', strtotime($exception->recurrenceId)) . ' ' . date('H:i:s', strtotime($exception->start));
153:             }
154:             else {
155:               $exRecId = date('Y-m-d', strtotime($exception->recurrenceId)) . ' ' . date('H:i:s', strtotime($event->start));
156:             }           
157:           }
158:           $exdatetime = new \DateTime($exRecId, new \DateTimeZone($exception->timezone));
159:           
160:           if ($event->deleted) {
161:             if ($first) {
162:               $first = false;
163:               $starttime = new \DateTime($exception->start, new \DateTimeZone($exception->timezone));
164:               $endtime = new \DateTime($exception->end, new \DateTimeZone($exception->timezone));
165:               $rdate_d = clone $exdatetime;
166:               $rdate_d->setTimezone(new \DateTimeZone('UTC'));                       
167:               if ($exception->all_day) {
168:                 $date = $rdate_d->format('Ymd');
169:                 $vevent->add(ICS::RDATE, $date, [ICS::VALUE => ICS::VALUE_DATE]);
170:                 $vevent->add(ICS::DTSTART, $exdatetime->format('Ymd'), [ICS::VALUE => ICS::VALUE_DATE]);
171:               } else {
172:                 $date = $rdate_d->format('Ymd') . 'T' . $rdate_d->format('His') . 'Z';
173:                 $vevent->add(ICS::RDATE, $date, [ICS::VALUE => ICS::VALUE_DATE_TIME]);
174:                 $vevent->DTSTART = clone $exdatetime;
175:               }
176:               $dateTime = new \DateTime('@'.$exception->modified, new \DateTimeZone($exception->timezone));
177:               $dateTime->setTimezone(new \DateTimeZone('UTC'));
178:               $date = $dateTime->format('Ymd') . 'T' . $dateTime->format('His') . 'Z';
179:               // Attributs sur l'alarme
180:               $x_moz_lastack = $event->getAttribute(ICS::X_MOZ_LASTACK);
181:               if (isset($x_moz_lastack)) $vevent->{ICS::X_MOZ_LASTACK} = $x_moz_lastack;
182:               $x_moz_snooze_time = $event->getAttribute(ICS::X_MOZ_SNOOZE_TIME);
183:               if (isset($x_moz_snooze_time)) $vevent->{ICS::X_MOZ_SNOOZE_TIME} = $x_moz_snooze_time;
184:               // X Moz Generation
185:               $moz_generation = $event->getAttribute(ICS::X_MOZ_GENERATION);
186:               if (isset($moz_generation)) $vevent->add(ICS::X_MOZ_GENERATION, $moz_generation);
187:               // DTSTAMP
188:               $dtstamp = $event->getAttribute(ICS::DTSTAMP);
189:               if (isset($dtstamp)) $vevent->add(ICS::DTSTAMP, $dtstamp);
190:               else $vevent->add(ICS::DTSTAMP, $date);
191:               // LAST-MODIFIED
192:               $last_modified = $event->getAttribute(ICS::LAST_MODIFIED);
193:               if (isset($last_modified)) $vevent->add(ICS::LAST_MODIFIED, $last_modified);
194:               else $vevent->add(ICS::LAST_MODIFIED, $date);
195:               // CREATED 
196:               $created = $event->getAttribute(ICS::CREATED);
197:               if (isset($created)) $vevent->add(ICS::CREATED, $created);
198:               else $vevent->add(ICS::CREATED, $date);
199:               //$vevent->SUMMARY = $exception->title;
200:               //$vevent->add(ICS::X_MOZ_GENERATION, count($event->exceptions));
201:               $vevent->add(ICS::X_MOZ_FAKED_MASTER, "1");
202:             }           
203:             if (!isset($vevent->DTSTART)) {
204:               continue;
205:             }
206:             if ($vevent->DTSTART[ICS::VALUE] == ICS::VALUE_DATE) {
207:               $date = $exdatetime->format('Ymd');
208:             }
209:             else {
210:               $date = $exdatetime->format('Ymd') . 'T' . $exdatetime->format('His');
211:             }
212:           }
213:           elseif ($vevent->DTSTART[ICS::VALUE] == ICS::VALUE_DATE) {
214:             $date = $exdatetime->format('Ymd');
215:           } 
216:           else {
217:             if (!isset($vevent->DTSTART)) {
218:               continue;
219:             }
220:             $date = $exdatetime->format('Ymd') . 'T' . $exdatetime->format('His');
221:           }
222:           if ($exception->deleted && !$event->deleted) {
223:             $exdate[] = $date;
224:           } else if (isset($exception->start) && isset($exception->end)) {
225:             $vexception = $vcalendar->add('VEVENT');
226:             // UID
227:             $vexception->UID = $exception->uid;
228:             if ($vevent->DTSTART[ICS::VALUE] == ICS::VALUE_DATE) {
229:               $vexception->add(ICS::RECURRENCE_ID, $date, [ICS::VALUE => ICS::VALUE_DATE]);
230:             } else {
231:             $vexception->add(ICS::RECURRENCE_ID, $date, [ICS::VALUE => ICS::VALUE_DATE_TIME, ICS::TZID => $exception->timezone]);
232:             }
233:             $vexception = self::getVeventFromEvent($vexception, $exception, $calendar, $user, $useattachments, $isfreebusy);
234:           }
235:         }
236:         // Gestion des EXDATE
237:         if (count($exdate) > 0) {
238:           foreach ($exdate as $date) {
239:             if ($vevent->DTSTART[ICS::VALUE] == ICS::VALUE_DATE) {
240:               $vevent->add(ICS::EXDATE, $date, [ICS::VALUE => ICS::VALUE_DATE]);
241:             } else {
242:             $vevent->add(ICS::EXDATE, $date, [ICS::VALUE => ICS::VALUE_DATE_TIME, ICS::TZID => $event->timezone]);
243:             }
244:           }
245:         }
246:       }
247:       return $vcalendar;
248:     }
249: 
250:     /**
251:      * Méthode permettant de générer l'objet VEVENT à partir des données de l'évènement
252:      * Cette méthode est séparée pour être appelé plusieurs fois, dans le cas où l'évènement a des exceptions
253:      * @param VObject\Component $vevent
254:      * @param Event $event
255:      * @param Calendar $calendar
256:      * @param User $user
257:      * @param boolean $useattachments Si l'ics doit inclure les pièces jointes
258:      * @param boolean $isfreebusy Si on ne retourne que les freebusy (pas de pièce jointe ou de participants)
259:      * @return VObject\Component $vevent
260:      */
261:     private static function getVeventFromEvent(VObject\Component $vevent, Event $event, Calendar $calendar = null, User $user = null, $useattachments = true, $isfreebusy = false) {
262:       M2Log::Log(M2Log::LEVEL_DEBUG, "EventToICS->getVeventFromEvent()");
263:         // Class
264:         if (isset($event->class)) {
265:             switch ($event->class) {
266:                 case Event::CLASS_CONFIDENTIAL:
267:                     $vevent->CLASS = ICS::CLASS_CONFIDENTIAL;
268:                     break;
269:                 case Event::CLASS_PRIVATE:
270:                     $vevent->CLASS = ICS::CLASS_PRIVATE;
271:                     break;
272:                 case Event::CLASS_PUBLIC:
273:                 default:
274:                   $vevent->CLASS = ICS::CLASS_PUBLIC;
275:                   break;
276:             }
277:         } else $vevent->CLASS = ICS::CLASS_PUBLIC;
278: 
279:         // Status
280:         if (isset($event->status)) {
281:           switch ($event->status) {
282:             default:
283:             case Event::STATUS_CONFIRMED:
284:               $vevent->STATUS = ICS::STATUS_CONFIRMED;
285:               break;
286:             case Event::STATUS_NONE:
287:               break;
288:             case Event::STATUS_CANCELLED:
289:               $vevent->STATUS = ICS::STATUS_CANCELLED;
290:               break;
291:             case Event::STATUS_TENTATIVE:
292:               $vevent->STATUS = ICS::STATUS_TENTATIVE;
293:               break;
294:           }
295:         } else $vevent->STATUS = ICS::STATUS_CONFIRMED;
296: 
297:         // DTSTAMP
298:         if (isset($event->modified)) {
299:           $dateTime = new \DateTime('@'.$event->modified, new \DateTimeZone($event->timezone));
300:           $dateTime->setTimezone(new \DateTimeZone('UTC'));
301:           $date = $dateTime->format('Ymd\THis\Z');
302:           $vevent->add(ICS::DTSTAMP, $date);
303:           $vevent->add(ICS::LAST_MODIFIED, $date);
304:           $created = $event->getAttribute(ICS::CREATED);
305:           if (isset($created))
306:             $vevent->add(ICS::CREATED, $created);
307:           else
308:             $vevent->add(ICS::CREATED, $date);
309:         }
310: 
311:         // DateTime
312:         if (isset($event->start) && isset($event->end)) {
313:             $dateTimeStart = new \DateTime($event->start, new \DateTimeZone($event->timezone));
314:             $dateTimeEnd = new \DateTime($event->end, new \DateTimeZone($event->timezone));
315: 
316:             if ($event->all_day) {
317:                 // All day event
318:                 $vevent->add(ICS::DTSTART, $dateTimeStart->format('Ymd'), [ICS::VALUE => ICS::VALUE_DATE]);
319:                 $vevent->add(ICS::DTEND, $dateTimeEnd->format('Ymd'), [ICS::VALUE => ICS::VALUE_DATE]);
320:             } else {
321:                 $vevent->DTSTART = $dateTimeStart;
322:                 $vevent->DTEND = $dateTimeEnd;
323:             }
324:         }
325: 
326:         // Problème de user uid vide
327:         $user_uid = $user->uid;
328:         // Test si l'événement est privé, confidentiel ou public
329:         if (($event->class == Event::CLASS_PRIVATE
330:                 || $event->class == Event::CLASS_CONFIDENTIAL)
331:                 && (($event->owner != $user_uid
332:                 && isset($calendar)
333:                 && $calendar->owner !=  $user_uid
334:             && !$calendar->asRight(\LibMelanie\Config\ConfigMelanie::PRIV)) || !isset($user_uid))) {
335:             $vevent->SUMMARY = 'Événement privé';
336:     } else if ($isfreebusy) {
337:       $vevent->SUMMARY = '[' . self::convertStatusToFR($event->status) . '] Événement';
338:         } else {
339:             // Titre
340:             if (isset($event->title) && $event->title != "") {
341:               $vevent->SUMMARY = self::cleanUTF8String($event->title);
342:             }
343:             else {
344:               $vevent->SUMMARY = 'Sans titre';
345:             }
346:             // Catégories
347:             if (isset($event->category) && $event->category != "") {
348:               $categories = explode(',', $event->category);
349:               foreach ($categories as $category) {
350:                 $vevent->add(ICS::CATEGORIES, $category);
351:               }
352:             }
353:             // Description
354:             if (isset($event->description) && $event->description != "") {
355:               $vevent->DESCRIPTION = self::cleanUTF8String($event->description);
356:             }
357:             // Location
358:             if (isset($event->location) && $event->location != "") {
359:               $vevent->LOCATION = self::cleanUTF8String($event->location);
360:             }
361:             // Alarm
362:             if (isset($event->alarm) && $event->alarm != 0) {
363:                 $valarm = $vevent->add('VALARM');
364:                 //$valarm->TRIGGER = '-PT'.$event->alarm.'M';
365:                 $valarm->TRIGGER = self::formatAlarm($event->alarm);
366:                 $valarm->TRIGGER[ICS::VALUE] = ICS::VALUE_DURATION;
367:                 $valarm->ACTION = ICS::ACTION_DISPLAY;
368:         // Attributs sur l'alarme
369:                 $x_moz_lastack = $event->getAttribute(ICS::X_MOZ_LASTACK);
370:                 if (isset($x_moz_lastack)) $vevent->{ICS::X_MOZ_LASTACK} = $x_moz_lastack;
371:                 $x_moz_snooze_time = $event->getAttribute(ICS::X_MOZ_SNOOZE_TIME);
372:                 if (isset($x_moz_snooze_time)) $vevent->{ICS::X_MOZ_SNOOZE_TIME} = $x_moz_snooze_time;
373:             }
374:             // Traitement participants
375:             $organizer_attendees = $event->attendees;
376:             if (!is_null($organizer_attendees)
377:                     && is_array($organizer_attendees)
378:                     && count($organizer_attendees) > 0) {
379:               // Add organizer
380:             $params = [];
381:             $org_role = $event->organizer->role;
382:             if (isset($org_role)) {
383:               $params[ICS::ROLE] = $event->organizer->role;
384:             }
385:             $org_partstat = $event->organizer->partstat;
386:             if (isset($org_partstat)) {
387:               $params[ICS::PARTSTAT] = $event->organizer->partstat;
388:             }
389:             $org_rsvp = $event->organizer->rsvp;
390:             if (isset($org_rsvp)) {
391:               $params[ICS::RSVP] = $event->organizer->rsvp;
392:             }
393:             $org_name = $event->organizer->name;
394:             if (isset($org_name)) {
395:               $params[ICS::CN] = $event->organizer->name;
396:             }
397:             $org_sent_by = $event->organizer->sent_by;
398:             if (isset($org_sent_by)) {
399:               $params[ICS::SENT_BY] = $event->organizer->sent_by;
400:             }         
401:             $vevent->add(ICS::ORGANIZER,
402:                 'mailto:'.$event->organizer->email,
403:                 $params
404:         );
405:                 foreach ($organizer_attendees as $attendee) {
406:                     // Role
407:                     switch ($attendee->role) {
408:                         case Attendee::ROLE_CHAIR:
409:                             $role = ICS::ROLE_CHAIR;
410:                             break;
411:                         default:
412:                         case Attendee::ROLE_REQ_PARTICIPANT:
413:                             $role = ICS::ROLE_REQ_PARTICIPANT;
414:                             break;
415:                         case Attendee::ROLE_OPT_PARTICIPANT:
416:                             $role = ICS::ROLE_OPT_PARTICIPANT;
417:                             break;
418:                         case Attendee::ROLE_NON_PARTICIPANT:
419:                             $role = ICS::ROLE_NON_PARTICIPANT;
420:                             break;
421:                     }
422:                     // Parstat
423:                     switch ($attendee->response) {
424:                         case Attendee::RESPONSE_ACCEPTED:
425:                             $partstat = ICS::PARTSTAT_ACCEPTED;
426:                             break;
427:                         case Attendee::RESPONSE_DECLINED:
428:                             $partstat = ICS::PARTSTAT_DECLINED;
429:                             break;
430:                         case Attendee::RESPONSE_IN_PROCESS:
431:                             $partstat = ICS::PARTSTAT_IN_PROCESS;
432:                             break;
433:                         default:
434:                         case Attendee::RESPONSE_NEED_ACTION:
435:                             $partstat = ICS::PARTSTAT_NEEDS_ACTION;
436:                             break;
437:                         case Attendee::RESPONSE_TENTATIVE:
438:                             $partstat = ICS::PARTSTAT_TENTATIVE;
439:                             break;
440:                     }
441:                     $params = [
442:                             ICS::PARTSTAT => $partstat,
443:                             ICS::ROLE => $role,
444:                           ICS::RSVP => 'TRUE',
445:                         ];
446:                     $attendee_name = $attendee->name;
447:                     if (!empty($attendee_name)) {
448:                       $params[ICS::CN] = $attendee_name;
449:                     }
450:                     // Add attendee
451:                     $vevent->add(ICS::ATTENDEE, 'mailto:'.$attendee->email, $params);
452:                 }
453:             }
454:             // Calendar infos
455:             if (isset($calendar)) {
456:               // Ne plus utiliser ces informations qui ne devraient pas être nécessaire
457:               $vevent->add(ICS::X_CALDAV_CALENDAR_ID, $calendar->id);
458:               $vevent->add(ICS::X_CALDAV_CALENDAR_OWNER, $calendar->owner);
459:               // MANTIS 4002: Ajouter le creator dans la description lors de la génération de l'ICS
460:               if ($event->owner != $calendar->owner && !empty($event->owner) && strpos($vevent->DESCRIPTION, "[".$event->owner."]") === false) {
461:                 $vevent->DESCRIPTION = "[".$event->owner."]\n\n" . $vevent->DESCRIPTION;
462:               }
463:             }
464:             // Sequence
465:             $sequence = $event->getAttribute(ICS::SEQUENCE);
466:             if (isset($sequence)) $vevent->SEQUENCE = $sequence;
467:             // RECEIVED-SEQUENCE
468:             $received_sequence = $event->getAttribute(ICS::X_MOZ_RECEIVED_SEQUENCE);
469:             if (isset($received_sequence)) $vevent->add(ICS::X_MOZ_RECEIVED_SEQUENCE, $received_sequence);
470:             // RECEIVED-DTSTAMP
471:             $received_dtstamp = $event->getAttribute(ICS::X_MOZ_RECEIVED_DTSTAMP);
472:             if (isset($received_dtstamp)) $vevent->add(ICS::X_MOZ_RECEIVED_DTSTAMP, $received_dtstamp);
473:             // X Moz Send Invitations
474:             $send_invitation = $event->getAttribute(ICS::X_MOZ_SEND_INVITATIONS);
475:             if (isset($send_invitation)) $vevent->add(ICS::X_MOZ_SEND_INVITATIONS, $send_invitation);
476:             // X Moz Send Invitations Undisclosed
477:             $send_invitation_undisclosed = $event->getAttribute(ICS::X_MOZ_SEND_INVITATIONS_UNDISCLOSED);
478:             if (isset($send_invitation_undisclosed)) $vevent->add(ICS::X_MOZ_SEND_INVITATIONS_UNDISCLOSED, $send_invitation_undisclosed);
479:             // X Moz Generation
480:             $moz_generation = $event->getAttribute(ICS::X_MOZ_GENERATION);
481:             if (isset($moz_generation)) $vevent->add(ICS::X_MOZ_GENERATION, $moz_generation);
482:             // Transp
483:             $transp = $event->transparency;
484:             if (isset($transp)) $vevent->add(ICS::TRANSP, $transp);
485:             // Gestion des pièces jointes
486:             if ($useattachments) {
487:               $attachments = $event->attachments;
488:               if (isset($attachments)
489:                   && is_array($attachments)
490:                   && count($attachments) > 0) {
491:             foreach ($attachments as $attachment) {
492:               $params = [];
493:               if ($attachment->type == Attachment::TYPE_URL) {
494:                 // Pièce jointe URL
495:                 $data = $attachment->url;
496:               } else {
497:                 // Pièce jointe binaire
498:                 if (self::$USE_ATTACH_URL) {
499:                   // URL de téléchargement
500:                   $data = $attachment->url;
501:                   $params[ICS::X_CM2V3_SEND_ATTACH_INVITATION] = 'TRUE';
502:                   $params[ICS::X_CM2V3_ATTACH_HASH] = $attachment->hash;
503:                   $params[ICS::FMTTYPE] = $attachment->contenttype;
504:                 } else {
505:                   // Envoie du binaire directement
506:                   $data = $attachment->data;
507:                   $params[ICS::ENCODING] = ICS::ENCODING_BASE64;
508:                   $params[ICS::VALUE] = ICS::VALUE_BINARY;
509:                   $params[ICS::FMTTYPE] = $attachment->contenttype;
510:                 }
511:                 $params[ICS::X_MOZILLA_CALDAV_ATTACHMENT_NAME] = $attachment->name;
512:                 $params[ICS::SIZE] = $attachment->size;
513:               }
514:               // Add attachment
515:               $vevent->add(ICS::ATTACH, $data, $params);
516:             }
517:           }
518:             }
519:         }
520:         return $vevent;
521:     }
522: 
523:     /**
524:      * Ajoute le timezone au VCalendar
525:      * @param VObject\Component $vcalendar
526:      * @param string $timezone
527:      */
528:     private static function generationTimezone(VObject\Component $vcalendar, $timezone) {
529:         if (!ConfigMelanie::ICS_ADD_TIMEZONE) return;
530: 
531:         if ($timezone === 'Europe/Paris') {
532:             $vtimezone = $vcalendar->add('VTIMEZONE');
533:             $vtimezone->TZID = 'Europe/Paris';
534:             $vtimezone->add(ICS::X_LIC_LOCATION, 'Europe/Paris');
535:             $daylight = $vtimezone->add('DAYLIGHT');
536:             $daylight->TZOFFSETFROM = '+0100';
537:             $daylight->TZOFFSETTO = '+0200';
538:             $daylight->TZNAME = 'CEST';
539:             $daylight->DTSTART = '19700329T020000';
540:             $daylight->RRULE = 'FREQ=YEARLY;BYDAY=-1SU;BYMONTH=3';
541:             $standard = $vtimezone->add('STANDARD');
542:             $standard->TZOFFSETFROM = '+0200';
543:             $standard->TZOFFSETTO = '+0100';
544:             $standard->TZNAME = 'CET';
545:             $standard->DTSTART = '19701025T030000';
546:             $standard->RRULE = 'FREQ=YEARLY;BYDAY=-1SU;BYMONTH=10';
547:         }
548:     }
549: 
550:     /**
551:      * Formatte l'alarme en minutes en un trigger ICS
552:      * @param int $alarm En minutes
553:      * @return string
554:      */
555:     private static function formatAlarm($alarm) {
556:       if ($alarm < 0) {
557:         $trigger = "P";
558:         $alarm = - $alarm;
559:       }
560:       else {
561:         $trigger = "-P";
562:       }
563: 
564:       // Nombre de semaines, 10080 minutes
565:       if ($alarm >= 10080 && ($alarm % 10080) === 0) {
566:         $nb_weeks = (int)($alarm / 10080);
567:         $alarm -= $nb_weeks * 10080;
568:         $trigger .= $nb_weeks."W";
569:       }
570:       // Nombre de jours, 1440 minutes
571:     if ($alarm >= 1440) {
572:       $nb_days = (int)($alarm / 1440);
573:       $alarm -= $nb_days * 1440;
574:       $trigger .= $nb_days."D";
575:     }
576:     if ($alarm > 0) {
577:       $trigger .= "T";
578:     }
579:       // Nombre d'heures, 60 minutes
580:     if ($alarm >= 60) {
581:       $nb_hours = (int)($alarm / 60);
582:       $alarm -= $nb_hours * 60;
583:       $trigger .= $nb_hours."H";
584:     }
585:       // Nombre de minutes
586:     if ($alarm > 0) {
587:       $trigger .= $alarm."M";
588:     }
589:       return $trigger;
590:     }
591: 
592:     /**
593:      * Nettoyage UTF8 des données
594:      * Utilisé pour éviter le bloquage des synchros par Lightning
595:      * @param string $string
596:      * @return mixed
597:      */
598:     private static function cleanUTF8String($string) {
599:     return preg_replace('/[\x01\x02\x03\x04\x05\x08\x0B\x0E\x11\x12\x13\x14\x19\x1A\x1E\x1C\x1B\x1D\x1F]/', '', $string);
600:   }
601: 
602:   /**
603:    * Retourne la traduction francaise du status ICS
604:    * @param string $status
605:    * @return string
606:    */
607:   private static function convertStatusToFR($status) {
608:     $convert = array(
609:             'confirmed' => 'Confirmé',
610:             'tentative' => 'Provisoire',
611:             'cancelled' => 'Annulé',
612:             'default' => 'Libre',
613:     );
614:     if (isset($convert[$status])) {
615:       return $convert[$status];
616:     }
617:     else {
618:       return $convert['default'];
619:     }
620:   }
621: }
